panels.description: Live number of connected radios in Ella Core.
panels.title: Connected Radios

panels.description: Percentage of successful registration attempts by UE's in Ella Core over the last 5 minutes.
panels.title: Registration Success Rate

panels.description: Percentage of UE PDU Session Establishment Requests accepted by Ella Core over the last 5 minutes.
panels.title: PDU Session Establishment Success Rate

panels.description: Live number of active PDU sessions.
panels.title: Active PDU Sessions

panels.description: Total live throughput (uplink + downlink)
panels.title: Live Throughput

panels.description: Percentage of API requests returning 5xx status codes over the last 5 minutes.
panels.title: API Error Rate

panels.description: Amount of time since Ella Core started
panels.title: System Uptime

panels.description: CPU Cores used by Ella Core's user space program (this does not include XDP packet processing).
panels.title: CPU Cores

panels.description: Total physical RAM used by the process
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Total size of the SQLite database.
panels.title: Database Size

panels.description: Cumulative IP pool utilization for all data networks configured in Ella Core.
panels.title: IP Address Pool Utilization

panels.description: Received NGAP Messages per type.
panels.title: NGAP Message Rate

panels.description: Number of UEs in registered state.
panels.title: Registered Subscribers

panels.description: Rate of accepted vs rejected UE registration attempts per type.
panels.title: Registration Attempts

panels.description: Number of active PDU sessions in Ella Core.
panels.title: Active PDU Sessions

panels.description: Rate of accepted vs rejected PDU Session Establishment requests.
panels.title: PDU Session Establishment Attempts

panels.description: Bitrate for uplink and downlink GTP traffic
panels.title: Data Plane throughput

panels.description: XDP action rate for packets arriving on the N3 interface (from the radio network).
panels.title: XDP Actions - N3

panels.description: XDP action rate for packets arriving on the N6 interface (from the data network).
panels.title: XDP Actions - N6

panels.description: Amount of API requests per second.
panels.title: API Request Rate

panels.description: Rate of API request per endpoint color coded by status code.
panels.title: API Request Rate by Endpoint

panels.description: API latency percentiles per bucket. For example, a datapoint for p99 at 24.2ms means that 99% of requests take less than 24.2ms.
panels.title: API Latency Percentiles

panels.description: Percentage of successful API authentication over the last 5 minutes.
panels.title: API Authentication Success Rate

panels.description: Rate of successful vs failed API authentication attempts
panels.title: API Authentication Attempts

panels.description: Memory In-Use Bytes (Heap)
panels.title: Memory Heap

panels.description: Number of CPU cores used by the Ella Core process
panels.title: CPU Cores

panels.description: Number of goroutines
panels.title: Goroutines

panels.description: Total Database file size
panels.title: DB Size

panels.description: Rate of database queries by table and operation type
panels.title: DB Query Rate

panels.description: DB latency percentiles per bucket. For example, a datapoint for p99 at 3.987ms means that 99% of requests take less than 3.987ms.
panels.title: DB Latency Percentiles
